name: Shbrink
description:
MADE FOR TRIJAM #130!

Play as Sizzy the cube as you traverse 6 unique levels with spikes and bullet shooters throughout , the only way to get through is by resizing yourself to fit through narrow gaps, go super fast or jump extra high!

Music: 

Eternity by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3718-eternity

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

All gameplay made in 3 hours! 

Sound made and music grabbed after!

Youtube: (1) Spacespy - YouTube (Devlog coming soon!)

Twitter: (3) spacespyTV (@spacespy_tv) / Twitter

Discord: (3) spacespyTV (@spacespy_tv) / Twitter

Thanks for playing!
